name: PickCrafter (itch)
description:
✦ PICKCRAFTER:

Spawn into a procedurally generated tile world, destroy anything and everything, and make millions! Buy new picks, mine equipment, and more from the shop keeper!

=========================================

DIRECTIONS:

⋆ WASD to move

⋆ Click to mine

⋆ E to interact with the Shop Keeper + close the shop

⋆ Mouse Scroll Wheel to select items in your hotbar + scroll in the shop

⋆ Space to place tiles

⋆ Click on the item's icons to sell them while in the shop

⋆ Better ores sell for more money but they spawn deeper and deeper in the world

⋆ Use ladders to get up and down your mine shafts

=========================================

UPDATE LOG:

9/21/2022: Fixed ladder money dupe

9/21/2022: You can't mine on the loading screen

9/21/2022: Optimized torch lighting

=========================================

✦ Pro tip: Don't eat dirt.
